channel.title: Ned-Rig on Ksbigbass
channel.description: Recent content in Ned-Rig on Ksbigbass

item.title: A Better Ned Head
item.description:
A Better Ned Head, seems like we are all looking for a better Ned Rig setup. We’ve all been there. That little TRD worm catches a giant bass and the hook bends, breaks, or is too small and we lose the fish of a lifetime.

Berkley Half Head is rapidly becoming a goto in my tackle box.

Berkley Half Head Fishing Jigs

item.title: Have you heard of Ned?
item.description:
Have you heard of Ned: Ned’s Rig is a powerful finesse fishing tool for all kinds of fish and extremely different conditions. Â The technique uses an ultra light mushroom head jig. Usually something like a 1/10th ounce along with a spinning rod rigged with 6 or 8lb fluorocarbon.

This thing catches everything that swims, so you might be in for the fight of a lifetime.

More importantly have you heard of Ned’s rig?
